extDescription.message: Release Memory of Tab on regular basis.

setTimerTitle.message: Time to unload of inactive tab

all_unpurge.message: Free release in the all tabs.

explanation_assignment.message:
Specifies the local file to be used at the time of release.
If it specifies, even if expanded function become invalid, a tab will remain.
You can also specify a URL outside, I do not recommend because the following problems occur.
explanation_assignment.description: Explanation of assignment of local file.

explanation_problem1.message: Unless the internet connection environment is possible, it does not work properly.
explanation_problem1.description: Description of problem related to the specified local file

explanation_problem2.message: When the server of a release place is downed, it does not operate normally.
explanation_problem2.description: Description of problem related to the specified local file

explanation_problem3.message: The information on the page which is looking at self leaks outside.(URL or Title)
explanation_problem3.description: Description of problem related to the specified local file
